BASE_URL_TEMPLATE = 'https://l{layer}-lb-{network}.constellationnetwork.io'
BLOCK_EXPLORER_URL_TEMPLATE = 'https://be-{network}.constellationnetwork.io'
async get_address_balance(address_hash: str, balance_only: bool = True) → Balance | float[source]

Fetch the balance for a specific DAG address or public key.

Parameters:

  • address_hash – DAG address or public key

  • balance_only – If True, return only the balance as a float. Otherwise, return a Balance object.

Returns:

Balance object or balance as a float.

async get_last_reference(address_hash: str) → LastReference[source]

Fetch the last reference for a specific DAG address. :param address_hash: DAG address or public key :return: Dictionary containing the last reference information.

async get_pending_transaction(transaction_hash: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Fetch details of a pending transaction. :param transaction_hash: Transaction hash :return: Dictionary containing transaction details.

async static handle_response(response: ClientResponse) → Any[source]

Handle HTTP responses, raising custom exceptions for errors.

async post_transaction(transaction_data: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]

Submit a new transaction. :param transaction_data: Dictionary containing transaction details.
